title: promise444c5
author: promise444c5
content: ASK IT  I'm Opening this thread as a purpose to create a way for question and replies to a question mostly for newbies but all ranks are welcome though both replies and quetions , to serve as a way to ask questions about what they need to know. Besides, there's are many a lot of Knowledge and experienced officials  as well as individuals to answer questions .The thread is not only for Forum questions but also other related issues and questions about wallets , coins , tokens and other personal related matters you don't want to take outside the forum or feel like it would be considered trashed when you ask it . It's  a Local board we can all relate  just table it here.  Question  Format  Code:  [b]QST[/b] : ........... Reply  Format Code:  [b]RE TO [/b] [quote] Question[/quote]  ................ reply  Images fro replies and quetions is allowed  Rules   Replies must not be plagiarised No repetitive questions No Abusive content Note: I'm  authorised to delete post if required  or necessary  ~~ reply could be meritted by our Lb officials  if answered  perfectly

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: If newbies do not create new threads and only asking questions on a single thread, it would reduce the creation of new threads and discussion may not be accurate like it would be on new threads pertaining to each question separately. Quote from: promise444c5 on October 18, 2023, 06:59:59 PMI'm  authorised to delete post if required  or necessaryThis thread is not self-moderated. Which means you will still have to report the posts to be deleted to moderators and only moderators can delete it.Quote from: promise444c5 on October 18, 2023, 06:59:59 PM~~ reply could be meritted by our Lb officials  if answered  perfectlyWe do not have local board officials. Anybody can also merit any posts if meaningful, useful or helpful.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Quote from: promise444c5 on October 18, 2023, 06:59:59 PMThe thread is not only for Forum questions but also other related issues and questions about wallets , coins , tokens and other personal related matters you don't want to take outside the forum or feel like it would be considered trashed when you ask it . Firstly, it will defeat the purpose of having more threads created in the local board. Secondly, if all this are put together in one place, many vital questions will be missed out as it’ll be in the midst of the many questions that will be asked on this thread. If I have a question about mining; and the ones I can see on the first page and maybe middle and last page doesn’t talk about it, I will miss out on it if it has already been discussed on some pages I missed out while skimming through the thread. If there was sub-board in the LB, there won’t be any case of this but since we don’t have any, creating new thread about a question that hasn’t been asked before will be better.QuoteIt's  a Local board we can all relate  just table it here.Yes we can relate but it will make things disorganised more here.
